Constructor Detail

CSysSerialCom

public CSysSerialCom(String portName,
                     int baudRate,
                     int dataBits,
                     int parity,
                     int stopBits)
              throws CSysCommunicationPort.ParameterNotSupported
Deprecated. 
Constructor. Initializes and opens COM-Port

Parameters:
portName - The name of the port (e.g. "COM1")
baudRate - The baud rate (150,300,1200,2400,4800,9600,19200,38400,57600,115200)
dataBits - The number of bits per character (5-8)
stopBits - The number of stop bits (1, 1.5, 2)
parity - Odd, Even, None, Mark or Space Parity
Throws:
ParameterNotSupported - Thrown if parameters are wrong or port can't be opened
CSysCommunicationPort.ParameterNotSupported
